content: I have been sleepless for the past 3 nights, anybody else? Remember when you were younger and you missed a good nights sleep, you felt a little sleepy the next day and that was it. Now(when you get older) you just feel like you're coming down with something. Hate that feeling. "It is the weak who are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong" -- Leo Roskin
